p: Several fatty acids present in taro are suggested as potential antioxidants, including 9,12,15-octadecatrienoic acid, 8,11-octadecadienoic acid, methyl ester; hexadecanoic acid, methyl ester; 9-octadecenoic acid, methyl ester (E); 3,5-Di-tert-butyl-4-trimethylsiloxytoluene; cyclohexanol, 2-nethyl-5-(1-methylethenyl)- (1. alpha., 2. beta., 5. alpha.) [ 74, 78].
